name: BIG BALLERS VR
summary:
BECOME THE G.O.A.T 🐐 

Rank up in the fastest growing VR sports game, BIG BALLERS VR. Play with up to 12 players and perform crazy windmill contact dunks in basketball, slug dingers in baseball, and clutch it with game-winning touchdown catches. Try our MR Fitness mode too.  

🏈 EASY TO LEARN – HARD TO MASTER ⚾️🏀🏐

Our world-class physics engine gives you realistic natural gameplay while being easy to grasp yet challenging to master.

🗣️ COMMUNITY RUNS DEEP 🗣️

We strongly believe in respect. Earn...
